game.name: Stickman Freeride
game.description:
One of the best free online games to play for boys,  Stickman Freeride is an ultimate treat for all racing enthusiasts. Stickman is a true lover of sticky cycling situations. In this best online racing game, you will get a chance to ride your bicycle on a hilly, forest trail through the Stickman Wilderness. Navigating the falling and rising terrain of the forest trail is only possible with the help of magic of physics.

In this energized riding game, implement all the possible tricks and earn money that you can use later to upgrade your bikes and powers. Do not forget to unlock the achievements and ride your BMX bike like an expert racer. Play with an open mind through each level. In this cool free online racing game, your task is to perform different flips and reach the finish point as soon as possible. It will surely help you have unlimited fun when you help Stickman to leave the world behind and reach the top of the hill without having a fear about the obstacles and hurdles that may kill him. 

Making the stickman across 15 levels of this bicycle racing game ensures you to enjoy the thrill you have not experienced before. You can claim for a gold medal and cash for better upgrades in case if you will be able to beat the clock before the time of 60 seconds. To get the better amount of cash, clear the level in the least possible time. Use as much pedals as you can to encounter the hills and jumps perfectly. Avoid crashing and use physics to time your jumps. All the best and have a safe bicycle ride!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Stickman Freeride at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Cycle  games for best excitement and thrill in you!
